name: EVERSLAUGHT Invasion
abstract: Get ready for the ultimate VR action game with EVERSLAUGHT Invasion! Choose from three unique classes, then team up with a friend online to take on hordes of enemies and defeat the Great Corruption.

detail.app_release_note:
EVERSLAUGHT Invasion - THE RESURGENCE UPDATE - A complete game overhaul

When we released EVERSLAUGHT Invasion back in May 2023, we wanted to revolutionize VR gaming and bring true fast-paced action to the medium. We believed that the intensity of old-school First Person Shooters should be felt in VR, without pulling punches.

With this Major Update, we think we have finally come a major step closer to that goal.

What's New:

- New Survivor mode!
- Quick Upgrades!
- Unique Weapon Abilities!
- Talents and Masteries!
- Life-saving Pickups!
- Upgraded Audio-Visuals!
- Strong Co-Op Focus!
- Five Difficulty Settings!
- 7 different languages!

From all of us at MobX Games, thank you so much for your unwavering support. It's been a huge part of what keeps us going!
We would love to hear from you, so do not forget to drop by our Discord server at discord.gg/everslaught
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
